DOC.brief_title: Safety & Immunogenicity Pneumococcal Vaccine 2189242A Co-administered With DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib Healthy Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This study ass safety , reactogenicity , immunogenicity persistence two formulation GSK Biologicals ' pneumococcal vaccine 2189242A [ high dose ( HD ) low dose ( LD ) ] give 3-dose primary vaccination course first 6 month life follow booster dose 12-15 month age co-administered Infanrix hexa™ compare vaccination Synflorix™ Prevnar 13™ similarly co-administered Infanrix hexa™ vaccine .
